analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_contracts/0xa97c177a46494029529caf34be814ef9024aa7d9.sol:
	Contract ABCToken has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_contracts/0xa97c177a46494029529caf34be814ef9024aa7d9.sol#171-172)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_contracts/0xa97c177a46494029529caf34be814ef9024aa7d9.sol#68-70) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_value' of ABCToken.burn (/unique_contracts/0xa97c177a46494029529caf34be814ef9024aa7d9.sol#149-150) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_from' of ABCToken.burnFrom (/unique_contracts/0xa97c177a46494029529caf34be814ef9024aa7d9.sol#157) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_value' of ABCToken.burnFrom (/unique_contracts/0xa97c177a46494029529caf34be814ef9024aa7d9.sol#157-158) is not in mixedCase
